about_the_game:
Take the role of Captain Keysis in his quest to defeat Dark Magician Reg who is trying to take control of the Land of Disred. Embark into a magical adventure in the first episode of a trilogy. Find your way across the levels searching the magical lost keys, collecting items, avoiding traps, and fighting powerful enemies in a classic-style platformer game! Do you think you can discover the "Secret"?

THIS DEMO ONLY INCLUDES THE FIRST 3 LEVELS OF THE GAME

Key Features


  • Run across 16 levels in 4 different worlds!
  • Search for secret rooms and items
  • Great replay value thanks to a exciting ranking system implemented in each stage
  • Finish the game with a perfect rank to unlock the true ending!
detailed_description:
Take the role of Captain Keysis in his quest to defeat Dark Magician Reg who is trying to take control of the Land of Disred. Embark into a magical adventure in the first episode of a trilogy. Find your way across the levels searching the magical lost keys, collecting items, avoiding traps, and fighting powerful enemies in a classic-style platformer game! Do you think you can discover the "Secret"?

THIS DEMO ONLY INCLUDES THE FIRST 3 LEVELS OF THE GAME

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Family
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1600 or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: A classic style 2D platfomer game where you take the role of Captain Keysis, hero of the Land of Eralia. Find your way across the levels searching the magical lost keys, collecting items, avoiding traps, and fighting powerful enemies to obtain new power ups!
